coreAttributes.authorTag: On the underside of the body, there is a small engraving that reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Forgeworks."
coreAttributes.name: arcane taser
coreAttributes.description: This weapon uses an air spell housed in a cartridge to propel two dart-like projectiles that are linked back to the main unit with conductive wires. After the barbs embed themselves in the target's aura, the main unit then sends a charge of arcane lightning down the wires.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unholster)] the taser, readying it for use in combat.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(holster)] the taser, before putting it away.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Aiming [npc.her] taser at [npc2.name], [npc.she] #IF game.isSillyModeEnabled() #THEN [npc.verb(shouts)] [npc.speech(Stop right there, criminal scum!)] before pulling the trigger. #ELSE [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger. #ENDIF The metal darts embed themselves in [npc2.namePos] aura while pink and purple lightning course through the wires, draining [npc2.her] energy! The spent cartridge ejects itself and dissolves into thin air. [npc.Name] suddenly [npc.verb(find)] another cartridge in [npc.her] [npc.hand] and [npc.verb(insert)] it into the business end of the taser. #IF !npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_ARCANE_AROUSAL_LUSTFUL_DISTRACTION) #THEN [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_ARCANE_AROUSAL_LUSTFUL_DISTRACTION, 4)] [npc2.Name] [npc.is] feeling the lingering effects of the arcane lightning. #ENDIF

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(shoot)] [npc2.name] with [npc.her] #IF game.isSillyModeEnabled() #THEN taser with a shout of [npc.speech(I am the law!)] #ELSE taser. #ENDIF There is a loud bang and then a brilliant pink and purple flash as [npc2.namePos] energy is drained! The spent cartridge pops out and [npc.name] [npc.verb(insert)] another one into the taser. #IF !npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_ARCANE_AROUSAL_LUSTFUL_DISTRACTION) #THEN [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_ARCANE_AROUSAL_LUSTFUL_DISTRACTION, 4)] [npc2.Name] [npc.is] feeling the lingering effects of the arcane lightning. #ENDIF

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(fire)] [npc.her] taser. [npc2.Name] suddenly [npc.verb(find)] metal darts embedded in [npc2.her] aura before being surrounded by pulsating streams of arcane lightning! [npc2.she] has lost some energy! The spent cartridge clatters on the ground and [npc.name] [npc.verb(insert)] another one into the taser. #IF !npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_ARCANE_AROUSAL_LUSTFUL_DISTRACTION) #THEN [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_ARCANE_AROUSAL_LUSTFUL_DISTRACTION, 4)] [npc2.Name] [npc.is] feeling the lingering effects of the arcane lightning. #ENDIF

missDescriptions.missText: Aiming [npc.her] taser at [npc2.name], [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger. The metal darts glance off [npc2.nameHas] aura and fall uselessly to the ground! #IF game.isSillyModeEnabled() #THEN [npc.speech(You betrayed the law!)] [npc.name] [npc.verb(shout)]. [npc2.Name] sneers and mockingly [npc.verb(shout)] back [npc2.speech(Laawwwwwww!)] #ELSE #ENDIF With an annoyed huff, [npc.name] [npc.verb(eject)] the spent cartridge and [npc.verb(insert)] a new one into the business end of the taser.

[npc.Name] shoot [npc2.name] with [npc.her] taser. There is a loud snapping sound but the metal darts fail to embed themselves in [npc2.namePos] aura! [npc.name] [npc.verb(insert)] another cartridge into the taser.
